prompts: Create a bear-like Pokemon that is cuddly yet powerful, with a pink and black color scheme.
I want a Pokemon that combines cuteness with strength, showcasing a unique bear appearance.
Generate an adorable yet tough Pokemon with distinctive black paws and a fluffy body.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a plush bear, emphasizing its playful nature and physical strength.
Imagine a Pokemon that is both a fighter and a friend, featuring a pink and black design.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a bear, with soft features but a fierce demeanor.
Show me a bear-themed Pokemon that is designed for both battling and companionship.
